中文简介: 本课程将涵盖主流社会心理学中的重要概念和理论，内容包括：个人如何看待自己和他人，如何看待和思考社会现象，人类的侵犯与助人行为，态度的形成与改变，社会影响及其表现，人际关系的基础与亲密关系，团体心理与行为，文化如何影响人，影响人类健康的社会心理因素，以及最新的积极心理学和网络心理学等。通过这门课程的学习,学生应该掌握社会心理学的基本概念、重要理论以及常用的研究方法，并能用这些知识解决自己所遇到的社会和心理问题。
英文简介: Social psychology studies the psychology and behavior of individuals and groups in social situations and their development patterns. This course will cover the important concepts and theories in mainstream social psychology,including how individuals look at themselves and others,critical thinking about social phenomena, human aggression and helping behavior, attitude formation and change, social influence and its performance, the foundation of interpersonal relationships and intimacy, group psychology and behavior, how culture affects people, the psychosocial factors that affect human health, and the latest positive psychology. This course focuses on the application of social psychology in social life, the formation and maintenance of interpersonal relationships, principles of interpersonal communication and conflict resolution, and a smooth team work.This course will also focus on contemporary scholars' researches on human psychology and behavior under different cultural backgrounds. Through this course, students will master the research contents, research methods and major research results of social psychology and better understand social life and events.

教学大纲: 1 探讨大学生面对的基本心理课题，学习维护心理健康2 掌握心理健康的基本常识和为人处事的基本技巧3 培养学生运用心理学的知识和原理解决生活中遇到的实际问题4 了解心理求助的途径和方法教学内容总共有15讲，具体主题如下所示。每周完成一讲的教学内容。第1讲 心理健康概述：介绍心理健康的概念。主要内容包括：心理健康的定义和标准；心理异常的界定和分类；大学生常见的心理健康问题；心理保健手段。（2学时）第2讲 环境适应与心理健康：介绍环境适应有关的问题与应对。内容包括：环境适应和适应障碍的概念；大学生环境适应要面对的问题与解决方法；适应大学生活的一般技巧。（2学时）第3讲 学业成就与心理健康：介绍大学学习的有关问题与应对。内容包括：大学学习的特点；学习能力的培养；学习动机；与学习有关的心理问题与应对。（2学时）第4讲 人际关系与心理健康：介绍人际关系的心理学。内容包括：人际关系概述；影响人际交往的认知、情感和人格特点等因素；大学生人际关系的特点；人际吸引的影响因素。（2学时）第5讲 人际交往技巧：介绍人际交往的技巧。主要内容：大学生常见的人际交往问题与应对；人际冲突与人际沟通；建立良好人际关系的原则和技巧。（2学时）第6讲 大学生的恋爱心理：介绍恋爱心理的有关问题。主要内容包括：关于爱情的心理学理论；大学生常见的恋爱问题与应对；培养健康的恋爱心理。（2学时）第7讲 大学生的性心理：介绍性心理的有关问题。主要内容包括：男女性心理的差异；性心理健康标准；大学生常见的性心理困扰与应对；性心理问题的处理原则。（2学时）第8讲 自我意识与心理健康：介绍自我意识有关的心理问题。主要内容包括：自我意识的概念；大学生自我意识的发展特点；大学生常见的与自我意识有关的心理问题与应对；如何形成健全的自我意识。（2学时）第9讲 职业发展与规划：介绍职业规划与择业的有关心理问题。主要包括：职业规划的一般原则；人格与职业类型理论；大学生常见的择业的心理问题与应对；大学生职业指导。（2学时）第10讲 情绪与心理健康：介绍情绪对心理的影响与情绪调节。主要内容包括：情绪活动的一般特点；关于情绪调节的情绪认知理论；大学生常见的情绪问题与应对；关于自杀与防治。（2学时）第11讲 压力及其应对：介绍压力的对身心的影响和压力的自我调节。主要内容包括：压力对身体和心理的影响；压力的认知理论模型；压力的自我调适方法。（2学时）第12讲 心理障碍与防治1：介绍主要心理障碍类型的病理表现与防治。主要内容包括：心理障碍概述；焦虑障碍、心身障碍、成瘾障碍的病理表现与防治。（2学时）第13讲 心理障碍与防治2：介绍主要心理障碍类型的病理表现和防治。主要内容包括：情感障碍、精神分裂症、人格障碍的病理表现与防治；心理障碍的防治原则；对待心理障碍的态度。（2学时）第14讲 心理咨询与求助：介绍心理求助的途径和方法。主要内容包括：大学生心理求助的特点；心理求助的障碍；心理咨询和治疗的理论与方法。（2学时）第15讲 总结：概括一学期的主要内容；交流学习体验与感受；探讨完善自我的方法。（2学时）课堂讲授和讨论为主，讨论问题涉及大家常见的困惑，需要同学参与。每次课开始时有几分钟的小练习，主题与课程内容相关，两三人一组进行讨论交流。每次课结束时有总结性的配乐PPT以加深学生对本次课程内容的印象。1 平时出勤和课上讨论占15%，缺席一次总评成绩扣3分2 平时作业占35%（两次）3 期末论文占50%，无期末考试

中文简介: 实验心理学是关于心理学的研究方法的一门课程，分理论课和实验课两部分。实验心理学实验课通过让学生操作多个具体的教学实验来帮助他们深入理解实验设计的基本原理，为其看懂心理学的科研论文以及将来自己从事心理学的科学研究打下基础。实验课除了可以帮助学生深刻理解经典的心理学实验方法，还可以让他们熟悉一些随学科发展涌现的新的研究方法和技术。实验心理学实验课包括近30个实验，内容涉及心理物理学、反应时、视听知觉、注意、记忆、思维、语言等多个领域的典型实验范式。在课程中学生要自己动手完成实验，并收集数据进行统计分析、撰写实验报告。该课程会让学生在实验设计及实施、数据处理、论文写作等多个方面得到综合性的训练；让他们学会客观评估实验的科学性和逻辑性，进而培养学生独立从事心理学实验研究的能力。实验课对于培养学生的专业兴趣是非常重要的。
英文简介: Experimental psychology focuses on the logic, principles and practices of experimental approaches to psychological issues. The course is divided into two parts: Theory and Practice. As for the Practice part (Experiments in Experimental Psychology), we are aiming at preparing the student for their future experimental research by a number of teaching experiments in different topical areas of psychology. By engaging in actual laboratory work, students are guided to become familiar with the research questions and experimental paradigms in various branches of experimental psychology, which covers psychophysics, reaction time, perception as vision and audition, attention, memory, problem solving, decision making, language and so on. This course trains students` capacity to design experiments, conduct experimental control, analyze data and write research papers, etc. Students are also expected to be able to evaluate a given experiment design under rigid scientific criteria. 英文简介: Experimental psychology focuses on the logic, principles and practices of experimental approaches to psychological issues. The course is divided into two parts: Theory and Practice. As for the Practice part (Experiments in Experimental Psychology), we are aiming at preparing the student for their future experimental research by a number of teaching experiments in different topical areas of psychology. By engaging in actual laboratory work, students are guided to become familiar with the research questions and experimental paradigms in various branches of experimental psychology, which covers psychophysics, reaction time, perception as vision and audition, attention, memory, problem solving, decision making, language and so on. This course trains students` capacity to design experiments, conduct experimental control, analyze data and write research papers, etc. Students are also expected to be able to evaluate a given experiment design under rigid scientific criteria. Practice in teaching experiments is a key component which contributes to the students’ passion for psychology.

中文简介: 实验心理学是关于心理学的研究方法的一门课程，分理论课和实验课两部分。实验心理学实验课通过让学生操作多个具体的教学实验来帮助他们深入理解实验设计的基本原理，为其看懂心理学的科研论文以及将来自己从事心理学的科学研究打下基础。实验课除了可以帮助学生深刻理解经典的心理学实验方法，还可以让他们熟悉一些随学科发展涌现的新的研究方法和技术。实验心理学实验课包括近30个实验，内容涉及心理物理学、反应时、视听知觉、注意、记忆、思维、语言等多个领域的典型实验范式。在课程中学生要自己动手完成实验，并收集数据进行统计分析、撰写实验报告。该课程会让学生在实验设计及实施、数据处理、论文写作等多个方面得到综合性的训练；让他们学会客观评估实验的科学性和逻辑性，进而培养学生独立从事心理学实验研究的能力。实验课对于培养学生的专业兴趣是非常重要的。
英文简介: Experimental psychology focuses on the logic, principles and practices of experimental approaches to psychological issues. The course is divided into two parts: Theory and Practice. As for the Practice part (Experiments in Experimental Psychology), we are aiming at preparing the student for their future experimental research by a number of teaching experiments in different topical areas of psychology. By engaging in actual laboratory work, students are guided to become familiar with the research questions and experimental paradigms in various branches of experimental psychology, which covers psychophysics, reaction time, perception as vision and audition, attention, memory, problem solving, decision making, language and so on. This course trains students` capacity to design experiments, conduct experimental control, analyze data and write research papers, etc. Students are also expected to be able to evaluate a given experiment design under rigid scientific criteria. Practice in teaching experiments is a key component which contributes to the students’ passion for psychology.

英文简介: The central nervous system consists of the brain and spinal cord .The brain plays a central role in the control of most bodily functions, including awareness, movements, sensations, thoughts, speech, and memory. Some reflex movements can occur via spinal cord pathways without the participation of brain structures. The spinal cord is connected to a section of the brain called the brainstem and runs through the spinal canal. Cranial nerves exit the brainstem. Nerve roots exit the spinal cord to both sides of the body. The spinal cord carries signals (messages) back and forth between the brain and the peripheral nerves. Cerebrospinal fluid surrounds the brain and the spinal cord and also circulates within the cavities (called ventricles) of the central nervous system. The leptomeninges surround the brain and the spinal cord. The cerebrospinal fluid circulates between 2 meningeal layers called the pia matter and the arachnoid (or pia-arachnoid membranes). The outer, thicker layer serves the role of a protective shield and is called the dura matter. The basic unit of the central nervous system is the neuron (nerve cell). Billions of neurons allow the different parts of the body to communicate with each other via the brain and the spinal cord. A fatty material called myelin coats nerve cells to insulate them and to allow nerves to communicate quickly.

中文简介: 社会心理学研究个体、群体的社会心理与社会行为及其发展规律。本课程将涵盖主流社会心理学中的重要概念和理论，主要内容包括：个人如何看待自己和他人，如何看待和思考社会现象，人类的侵犯与助人行为，态度的形成与改变，社会影响及其表现，人际关系的基础与亲密关系，团体心理与行为，文化如何影响人，影响人类健康的社会心理因素，以及最新的积极心理学。本课程关注社会心理学知识在社会生活中的应用，人际关系的形成与维持，人际沟通的原理与冲突化解以及从事通畅的团队合作等。本课程还将关注当代学者对于不同文化背景下人类心理与行为的研究。通过这门课程的学习,学生应该掌握社会心理学的研究内容、研究方法和主要研究结果，并用于理解相关的社会生活和事件。
英文简介: Social psychology studies the psychology and behavior of individuals and groups in social situations and their development patterns. This course will cover the important concepts and theories in mainstream social psychology,including how individuals look at themselves and others,critical thinking about social phenomena, human aggression and helping behavior, attitude formation and change, social influence and its performance, the foundation of interpersonal relationships and intimacy, group psychology and behavior, how culture affects people, the psychosocial factors that affect human health, and the latest positive psychology. This course focuses on the application of social psychology in social life, the formation and maintenance of interpersonal relationships, principles of interpersonal communication and conflict resolution, and a smooth team work.This course will also focus on contemporary scholars' researches on human psychology and behavior under different cultural backgrounds. Through this course, students will master the research contents, research methods and major research results of social psychology and better understand social life and events.

It mainly includes the issues below: Knowing yourself (including vocational interests, aptitude/ability, career motivation, personality, and so on), and Knowing vocations/career so as to pursue person-job fit; Career choice and career decision-making, and career maturity; Personnel assessment and selection in vocational psychology; Career development and planning; Individiual career management and Organizational career management; Career guidance and counseling; Career adjustment and stress management. The methods of lecture, case study, and self-assessment are employed to hlep students know more about the practical implications of vocational theories, which improve their awareness of career planning and management and related  abilities for pratical career issues, and potential abilities to design some career-related studies as well.

中文简介: 根据预测，到2050年我国65岁以上老年人口将达到3.2亿以上，约占我国总人口的1/5，占世界老年人口的1/4。人口老龄化问题，以及由此衍生出来的提高老年人生活质量、生活满意度等一系列心理课题已经成为我国乃至世界各国老年学专家关注的热点。我们该如何应对老龄化所带来的一系列挑战？通过老年心理学的研究，可以对以上一系列问题有新的认识，并得出相应的解决方案。老年心理学是研究个体和群体成年以后老化过程的心理活动变化、特点、规律的一门科学。是研究老年期个体的心理特征及其变化规律的发展心理学分支，又称老化心理学。它也是新兴的老年学的组成部分。由于人的心理活动以神经系统和其他器官功能为基础，并受社会的制约，所以老年心理学涉及生物的和社会的两方面的内容。研究范围包括人的感知觉、学习、记忆、思维等心理过程以及智力、性格、社会适应以及老年病等因年老而引起的变化。通过本课程的学习，可以帮助学生更系统的对老化过程，以及相应的心理变化有所了解，为提高老年人生活质量，促进社会和谐做出自己的贡献。

Regarded as an important area in cognitive psychology, it also has close ties with applied areas including engineering psychology, human-machine interaction, and medical rehabilitation. However, due to its multidisciplinary nature, studies on motor control are rare in Chinese psychology community. Notably, there is no dedicated course or textbook for motor control in China. On the other hand, in renowned universities around the world motor control is a widely accepted independent area that is routinely listed in the curriculum. Its research work also facilitates the development of neuroscience, cognitive science, and engineering.In this course, we will select the most representative research questions in the area of motor control and cover them in details. The course consists of lectures, literature reading, student presentations, etc. The aim is to learn basic content and research means in motor control and their relationship with other related disciplines.
